data.title: St. Julian Winery Rockford Wine Tasting Location
data.meta_description: Enjoy delicious St. Julian wine at our lovely Rockford location! Tastings are available as flights and can be enjoyed at a tasting room bar or on our patio.
data.text:
Wine & Cheese...or Pepperoni

We share this space with Flo's Wood Fired Pizza! Enjoy a wine tasting while waiting for your table at our St. Julian Winery Rockford location, or get takeout from Flo's to enjoy on our patio. Tastings are currently available as flights and can be enjoyed at a tasting room bar or outside on our patio! We also offer wine and hard cider by the glass, cocktails made with our spirits, and slushies!

Wine Tasting FAQ

Shop our extensive collection of wines, including our Braganini Reserve line and our classic favorites like Head Games, Michcato, and Sweet Revenge!
